basic_info.name: Krishna University Results
description: Students can check their annual exams results for various examinations from the official website of Krishna University. They are regularly uploaded on the site. Also for KRUSET exams students have to visit the official site only.

basic_info.name: Krishna University Faculty
description: The faculty at KU are dedicated to providing the best education to their students. With years of experience and research conducted under them the faculty at KU is one of the finest in the state. Some of these faculties include Sh. Biswa Bhusan Harichandan (Chancellor), Dr. Yallamraju Avasan Maruthi (Ph.D., Dept: Biosciences & Biotechnology ), Dr. M.V. Basaveswara Rao( Ph.D., Dept: Chemistry), Dr. A.V. Ramanamurthi (Ph.D., Dept: Telugu).

faqs.question: Ques. What is the KRUCET?
faqs.answer: Ans.It is the common entrance exam for M.A. and M.Sc. courses organized by Krishna University itself. Admission is based on rank and marks scored in it.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the best feature of Krishna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The best feature of KU is the teaching faculty and the curriculum. With teachers that have more than a decade of teaching experience, the teaching is very practical and industry readiness based.

faqs.question: Ques. How does the admission to the diploma courses take place at Krishna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Similar to other courses, Diploma does not require a state-level entrance exam, admission to it is merit-based.

faqs.question: Ques. Does Krishna University have any hostels?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, it does not have a hostel facility. However students can find quite affordable PG’s nearby Krishna University.

faqs.question: Ques. How can I reach Krishna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.The institute office is located at Machilipatnam Kona Road, Rudravaram, Machilipatnam, Andhra Pradesh (521001). The registrar of KU can be reached at registrarku@gmail.com , the principal office can be reached at kru.principal@gmail.com and the examination office can be reached at kuexams2010@gmail.com.

faqs.question: Where is Krishna University situated?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna University is located in Machilipatnam Kona Road in Rudravaram district of Andhra Pradesh, Pincode: Andhra Pradesh 521001.

faqs.question: Is Krishna University a private institute or government aided?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna University is a state university that offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Doctoral level courses in engineering, law, science, commerce, pharmacy, etc.

faqs.question: Does Krishna University accept state/national level exam scores for admission?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna University accepts state levelAP ICET/ AP PGECET/ AP LAWCET /AP EAMCETexam scores for its admission process.

faqs.question: What is the fee for the Krishna University MBA programs?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna University charges INR 20, 000 for the MBA program. The amount includes the exam fees, hostel fees and tuition fees.

faqs.question: Does Krishna University offer Distance education as well?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, Krishna University does not offer distance education to its students.

faqs.question: Does Krishna University conduct a counselling process for admission?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, Krishna University provides a counselling program for the shortlisted applicants. In the counselling process, candidates are required to submit their documents for verification dn pay the admission fee to reserve their seat.

faqs.question: When does the application process start in Krishna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna University commences its admission process in the month of June every year. The new session is scheduled to start from the month of July every year.

faqs.question: Does Krishna University have a research centre?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, an independent Centre for Research Studies (CRS) has been established to promote research, publication, development, and training programmes in the Krishna University. The research center functions on areas such as arts, science, commerce, and management.

faqs.question: What are the courses offered by Krishna University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna university offers various courses like B.Tech, L.L.B, B.A.L.L.B,B.Sc, B.Com, B.A., BBA, BBM, BCA, BHM, B.Ed, B.Pharma, M.Sc, M.Com, M.A., M.Pharma, MBA, MCA, MEd, L.L.M, M.Phil, Ph.D in regular mode.

Section.name: About Krishna University
Section.description:
Krishna University was established in 2008 in the Machilipatnam district of Andra Pradesh by the government of Andra Pradesh. It is affiliated to the UGC and a member of the AIU (Association of Indian Universities). It offers 22 courses in 70+ specializations. At the UG level, it offers Bachelor's degrees in 11 courses including engineering, law, science, commerce, pharmacy, etc, with more than 40 departments to choose from. For Post Graduation it offers degrees in science, business, education, etc, and Ph.D with a total of 30+ different specializations across all courses.
With sufficient teaching staff dedicated to imparting the best knowledge to its students, Krishna University is a stand out institute in the state of Andra Pradesh.
